snippet: Zipcar rents to people between the ages of 18 and 25. Avis Budget generally does not, or if it does, it charges them a lot of money. Whose policies will prevail after their merger?
abstract: Zipcar rents to people between the ages of 18 and 25. Avis Budget generally does not, or if it does, it charges them a lot of money. Whose policies will prevail after their merger?

headline.main: Zipcar, Avis and Age Discrimination Against Renters
